mapper.sql: id, author_id, title, cover, excerpt, content, markdown, likes, views, create_date, update_date, state
mapper.select: select t.id as tag_id,t.tag_name from tag t join relationship r on t.id= r.r_id and r.r_type='tag' where r.article_id = #{id}

select a.*,t.id as tag_id,author.author_name,author.avatar,author.github,author.email,author.introduction, t.tag_name,c.id as category_id,c.category_name from article a LEFT JOIN author on a.author_id = author.id LEFT JOIN relationship r on a.id=r.article_id LEFT JOIN tag t on t.id = r.r_id and r.r_type='tag' LEFT JOIN category c on c.id = r.r_id and r.r_type = 'category' where a.feature = 1 and a.state = 2
a.author_id =#{authorId}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET likes=likes+1 WHERE (id = #{id} AND state = #{state})
UPDATE article SET views=views+1 WHERE (id = #{id} AND state = #{state})
